name: Ripper's Lash
description: The Fae horticulturists of Revtel are known to push the boundaries of both cross pollination and safety.

abilities.name: Flay
abilities.description: Embeds thorns into all enemies within the target area. Affected enemies take additional damage when attacked.
notes: Creep attacks proc the debuff too, but for less damage.

additionalInfo: Acquired by crafting with Madstone. See the Madstone article for crafting mechanics.
